static boost::optional<unsigned> flusspferd::native_function_base::determine_arity (  )  [inline, static]

Static function for determining the arity in flusspferd::create.

Should be overwritten if you want to have an automatically determined arity, which will have precedence over any user-supplied arity.

Returns:
If an arity is determined, boost::optional<unsigned>(Arity), otherwise an empty boost::optional<unsigned>().

Reimplemented in flusspferd::native_function< T, Method >, and flusspferd::native_member_function< R, T >.
